entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PackageValidation runs in no-op incremental builds #23517
    .NET 7.0
  • dotnet build -r crashes with exception #23510

Closed

  • NuGet Credential Provider Plugin Fails to Start #21320
  • Adding net6.0 target framework to existing library breaks project #23520
  • .NET 5.0.211 only, 3.1 project restoring failed with error NU1102 #23471
  • Can't install dotnet-ef 6.0.1 by command line #23435

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove 1.0.5 and 1.1.2 installs from our linux runtimes #23525
    Area-Infrastructure
  • `dotnet watch` test fix search console history #23521
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix version.details entry for System.Commandline #23519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1563691 #23508
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Block loading the 7.0.100 SDK in 16.11 and below VS and MSBuild versions #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Backport Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ (#23318) #23400
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked, Area-Watch, 6.0.3xx
  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23419
    Area-AspNetCore, DO NOT MERGE, 6.0.3xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23504
    Area-Infrastructure
